text: Gustavo Alonso from the ETH Zurich, Switzerland was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for contributions to data management and distributed systems. ==Career== Alonso studied telecommunications-electrical engineering- at the Madrid Technical University (ETSIT, Politecnica de Madrid). A Fulbright scholar, he received a M.S. and Ph.D. in Computer Science at UC Santa Barbara. For a year after, he worked at the IBM Almaden Research Center before joining ETHZ.ETH Bio == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:University of California, Santa Barbara alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Gustavo Alonso
